website_summaries.verdict: Worth its higher sticker price as a licensed controller for Wii and Wii U, with good button action and long-lasting reliability.
pros: As a licensed OEM product, matches original controllers in ergonomics, quality, and control
Stays responsive without degradation in quality for months or longer
Pairs easily with remote controller and Wii U
cons: Becomes less responsive after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this controller to watch a fat guy and a old man box on the wii at work. They had been arguing for several weeks and this was the only logical way I could come up with to settle the dispute. It was epic and worth every penny. The old man won
customer_reviews.author: jared hale

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for my second wii controller. It was packaged well and worth the price. All the buttons work and there was no discoloration to it. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Works just like the original
customer_reviews.text: I did have to remove the additional little vibration blocky thing from the end of my wii remote but honestly what does that thing even do other than buzz your hand every now and then? Aside from the price was nice and now my kids can both play Lego Star Wars at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Orphynanni

customer_reviews.title: New to Wii U
customer_reviews.text: New to Wii U and all these extra components. These Nunchuks work great, fast delivery and good customer service.great purchase with no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie N

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for one my dog chewed up. It works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Friar

customer_reviews.title: Average quality nunchuck, as they all are.
customer_reviews.text: Works well as expected. However, as with most Nintendo brand nunchucks (and just nunchucks in general honestly), there comes a point where it starts disconnecting if jerked or moved too hard. Every Wii nunchuck I’ve ever owned has done this so I suppose it’s just a problem with how they’re all made. Just wish it wouldn’t have happened so soon after buying.
customer_reviews.author: HimeHowler

customer_reviews.title: Great for playing with others!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have a great time when they play with the wii. We only had one set of controls and now with this one, they can play together and have a lot of fun. We also bought one white control with Yoshi's theme, it's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, I didn’t think this would work well being that I’ve had bad experiences in the past buying certain electronics. However, I loved this and it works very well with my wii
customer_reviews.author: Lesly S

customer_reviews.title: This is not an official Nintendo product. Misleading product listing.
customer_reviews.text: Beware of this seller. This is not an official Nintendo product. Huge waste of my time ordering this and now I have to return it in the middle of this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Slosh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed extras for Game Nights at the library. They have served their purpose well
customer_reviews.author: pratt 51

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s a genuine Wii nunchuck! Arrived in excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Adam591

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: These Nintendo nunchucks were the final piece my family needed to be fully equipped for our trek back into the Wii world. We couldn’t box or cycle among other things without these nunchucks. I love that we can actively compete in games while safely in our family “bubble”.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Orellana

customer_reviews.title: Official Nintendo WiiU Nunchuk Controller
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for grandson. Was pleased as now he could play games together with his sibling.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne M.

customer_reviews.title: Not new AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these a couple weeks ago and I finally got it today and when I opened it I was very unhappy about it. The wire connecting to the controller was LITERALLY chewed up and I can see some of the wires. And there are multiple bite marks in it at were clear as day. I am NOT happy of what I got. I am asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: Allows for more control.
customer_reviews.text: These work just as they’re supposed to. More control when playing. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: FegelyTwinMommy

customer_reviews.title: Used, but worked great
customer_reviews.text: It was used but it worked great. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Faster than expected and great condition
customer_reviews.text: Got my item a week ahead of schedule and it was in great condition. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Norrell

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the Wii
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the Wii. Excellent condition, fast shipping, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My son is happy that we got a working Nunchuk Controller for the Wii now. Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: chris beverley

customer_reviews.title: Brand new
customer_reviews.text: As good as it suppose to work. New and original.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Yeong

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my Wiimote and Switch for Smash Ultimate. Is of good quality and got this one after my original Nunchuk’s joystick became unresponsive after a decade of use.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Discoloration from age.
customer_reviews.text: Some markings on controller, and yellowing due to age. Not exactly happy, but it will work with some cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: it worked. Was able to plug into my Wii remote and let it rip in some Wii Star Wars complete edition without any hiccups. Will buy a second one asap so I can get my other remote up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Works great and no issues
customer_reviews.text: Looks, acts and feels like the official product and have no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Grenrir

product_meta.title: Official Nintendo WiiU Nunchuk Controller - White (Bulk Packaging)
product_meta.description: Connect the Nunchuk controller to the Wii Remote and get ready. You've just begun a journey into the most immersive, heated gameplay experience ever offered. This combo offers the utmost precision. The Nunchuk controller and the accelerometer contained within it are the next leap in gaming. In first-person shooters, the controller carries the burden of movement, freeing you to aim and fire using a more natural motion with the Wii Remote. In a football game, you can make your quarterback elusive with the Nunchuk controller while you look for an open receiver to throw to using the Wii Remote.
feature_bullets: Features the "C" and "Z" buttons as well as an analog stick
Take two-handed control of your games
Connects directly to the Wii Remote, using the Wii Remote's communication and power functions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars203 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
